text:
"The Expendables" is a 2010 action movie that was produced by Avi Lerner, Kevin King Templeton, John Thompson and Robert Earl and was directed by Sylvester Stallone.
Plot.
The movie is about a team of mercenaries that are sent to a South American country to overthrow a cold-blooded dictator.
Sequels.
"The Expendables 2" and "The Expendables 3" were respectively released in 2012 and 2014.
